name: talent-factory
description: Professional Claude Code plugins for software development and education

plugins.name: git-workflow
plugins.description: Professional git commands with automated pre-commit checks, emoji conventional commits, PR creation, edit history, and intelligent merge conflict resolution. Includes comprehensive references, best practices, and professional workflow skills.

plugins.name: project-management
plugins.description: Comprehensive project management with PRD generation, project planning, single-task initialization with duplicate detection and ATOMIC validation, intelligent task implementation with plugin orchestration (Superpowers brainstorm, agent routing, quality gate), autonomous EPIC automation, Linear integration, and git worktree workflow for agile development

plugins.name: code-quality
plugins.description: Comprehensive code quality tools with Python linting, code review, and expert agents for Python and Frontend development

plugins.name: education
plugins.description: Teaching aids with Java Tutor agent, Markdown syntax formatter agent and skill, and code explanation for IT education

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: Comprehensive development utilities for plugin/command/agent development, validation, CI automation, text humanization, and PDF-to-Markdown conversion with expert agents

plugins.name: obsidian
plugins.description: Integration with Obsidian via TaskNotes Plugin API - task management directly from Claude Code

plugins.name: development
plugins.description: Expert development agents, project initialization with Git branching, Gradle Kotlin DSL, Python/uv support, and documentation synchronization tools
